subject: Re: Deploy Perl script on Windows
body:
Search for PAR on search.cpan.org.

Octavian

----- Original Message ----- 
From: 
To: 
Sent: Thursday, June 07, 2007 11:37 PM
Subject: Deploy Perl script on Windows


> Hi,
> 
> I'm currently learning Perl on win32 with ActiveState's ActivePerl
> 5.8.8 and I was wondering what is needed to run one of my script on
> another PC that does not have ActivePerl ?
> 
> I did some googling and found Perl2EXE but since it's not free I want
> to know if there is another solution besides deploying ActivePerl.
> 
> Thanks!
> 
> 
> -- 
> To unsubscribe, e-mail: beginners-unsubscribe@perl.org
> For additional commands, e-mail: beginners-help@perl.org
> http://learn.perl.org/
> 
>
